name: handspring
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of somersault (= movement in which you turn over completely) that involves moving forwards or backwards from a standing position to land on your hands and then back to a standing position: do a handspring He slipped while doing back handsprings. The children were doing cartwheels, handsprings, and forward rolls.
More examplesFewer examplesShe performed two complete handsprings and one somersault.A skill like a back handspring in the floor exercise is worth an extra point.They executed back handsprings and back tucks in perfect time with the music.
